header.topTitle: Looking for custom plans and pricing? Get a preview of our Social Media Packages
header.subtitle: “Our Custom Social Media Package is tailored to meet your unique business goals and audience preferences across all major platforms. It provides flexible, data-driven strategies to boost engagement, brand visibility, and conversions effectively.”

pricingDetails.title: Your Social Media Goals
pricingDetails.description: Your social media pricing depends on your goals — whether you’re aiming for brand awareness, audience engagement, or lead generation. We tailor packages to align with your marketing objectives and measurable growth targets

pricingDetails.title: Platform & Audience Strategy
pricingDetails.description: We evaluate your target audience, industry trends, and best-performing platforms (like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and TikTok) to create a content strategy that maximizes reach and engagement.

pricingDetails.title: Content & Campaign Requirements
pricingDetails.description: From creative post design to paid ad management and influencer collaborations, your plan cost reflects the mix of organic and paid strategies needed to achieve impactful results across social channels.

includedTitle: Included for All Soial media  Plans:
includedItems: High-quality backlink strategy and outreach (Google Business Profile, citations)
Content optimization & internal linking updates (site speed, indexing, mobile)
